price: 23. Waxaanuna hor keeni9 waxay (mushrikiinta, gaalada) ay camal san faleen, oo ka yeeli (qiimo la'aan) sida boor hawada ku baabba’ay.
arabic: وَقَدِمۡنَآ إِلَىٰ مَا عَمِلُواْ مِنۡ عَمَلٖ فَجَعَلۡنَٰهُ هَبَآءٗ مَّنثُورًا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: waqadim'nā ilā mā ʿamilū min ʿamalin fajaʿalnāhu habāan manthūran
